page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content: The Looe area is served by a practice with 5 doctors,2 health visitors and 5 district nurses. At the Pelynt surgery there are about 1,000 patients registered.It opens 3times a week- from9-10am Mondays and Wednesdays,from 5- 6.30pm on Fridays.Patients can attend on any day by appointment at the Looe surgery. Patients needing most help are the elderly who make a large part of the population(See P2);the group needing least help is middle aged men.Most frequent illness-mild virus infection. A baby clinic is held regularly.A chiropodist often comes to the village Emmergencies are treated at a cottage hospital in Liskeard(11ml)or at Plymouth general hospital(22ml) There are 2 dispensing chemists in Looe(Neighbours collect for those without cars) 2dentists work in Looe.
